verses.verse: Children, <S%G5043><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> right. <S%G1342><s%>

"Honor <S%G5091><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%>" which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a promise: <S%G1860><s%>
"that <S%G2443><s%> it may be <S%G1096><s%> well <S%G2095><s%> with you, <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you may <S%G2071><s%> live long <S%G3118><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>"

You <S%G3588><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> don't <S%G3949><s%> provoke your <S%G5216><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> to wrath, <S%G3949><s%> but <S%G235><s%> nurture <S%G1625><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the discipline <S%G3809><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> instruction <S%G3559><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Servants, <S%G1401><s%> be obedient to <S%G5219><s%> those who according to <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> are <S%G3588><s%> your masters, <S%G2962><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> trembling, <S%G5156><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> singleness <S%G572><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> to Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

not <S%G3361><s%> in the way <S%G2596><s%> of service <S%G3787><s%> only when eyes are on you, <S%G5613><s%> as men pleasers; <S%G441><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart; <S%G5590><s%>
with <S%G3326><s%> good will <S%G2133><s%> doing service, <S%G1398><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to men; <S%G444><s%>

knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> whatever <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3739><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> each <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> does, <S%G4160><s%> he will receive <S%G2865><s%> the same <S%G5124><s%> again from <S%G3844><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> he is bound <S%G1401><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> free. <S%G1658><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> You <S%G4160><s%> masters, <S%G2962><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the same things <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> give up <S%G447><s%> threatening, <S%G547><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he who is <S%G2076><s%> both their Master <S%G2962><s%> and yours <S%G5216><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G2532><s%> and there <S%G2076><s%> is no <S%G2076><s%> partiality <S%G4382><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Finally, <S%G3063><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G99999><s%> be strong <S%G1743><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the strength <S%G2904><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> might. <S%G2479><s%>

Put on <S%G1746><s%> the whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G4314><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> may be able <S%G1410><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the wiles <S%G3180><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2254><s%> wrestling <S%G3823><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> but <S%G235><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the principalities, <S%G746><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the powers, <S%G1849><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the world <S%G165><s%>'s rulers <S%G2888><s%> of the darkness <S%G4655><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> age, <S%G4314><s%> and against the spiritual <S%G4152><s%> forces of wickedness <S%G4189><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavenly places. <S%G2032><s%>

Therefore, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> put on <S%G353><s%> the whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to withstand <S%G436><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and, <S%G2532><s%> having done <S%G2716><s%> all, <S%G537><s%> to stand. <S%G2476><s%>

Stand <S%G2476><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> having <S%G4024><s%> the utility belt of <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> buckled <S%G4024><s%> around your <S%G5216><s%> waist, <S%G3751><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having put on <S%G1746><s%> the breastplate <S%G2382><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> having fitted <S%G4228><s%> your feet <S%G4228><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the preparation <S%G2091><s%> of the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of peace; <S%G1515><s%>

above <S%G1909><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> taking <S%G353><s%> up the shield <S%G2375><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> with <S%G3739><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> you will be able <S%G1410><s%> to quench <S%G4570><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fiery <S%G4448><s%> darts <S%G956><s%> of the evil one. <S%G4190><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> take <S%G1209><s%> the helmet <S%G4030><s%> of salvation, <S%G4992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

with <S%G1223><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2540><s%> <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> requests, <S%G1162><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> at all times in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> being <S%G846><s%> watchful <S%G69><s%> to this end <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> perseverance <S%G4343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> requests <S%G1162><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints: <S%G40><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> on <S%G5228><s%> my <S%G1700><s%> behalf, <S%G2443><s%> that utterance <S%G3056><s%> may be given <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> opening <S%G457><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth, <S%G4750><s%> to make known <S%G1107><s%> with boldness <S%G3954><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the Good News, <S%G2098><s%>

for <S%G5228><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I am an ambassador <S%G4243><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> chains; <S%G2443><s%> that in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%> I <S%G846><s%> may speak boldly, <S%G3955><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may know <S%G1492><s%> my <S%G1691><s%> affairs, <S%G2596><s%> how <S%G5101><s%> I am doing, <S%G4238><s%> Tychicus, <S%G5190><s%> the beloved <S%G27><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant <S%G1249><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> will make known <S%G1107><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> all things; <S%G3956><s%>

whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent <S%G3992><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G846><s%> very purpose, <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may know <S%G1097><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> state, <S%G4012><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that he may comfort <S%G3870><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to the brothers, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> love <S%G25><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> incorruptible love. <S%G861><s%> Amen.
